corrections.name: test_DeepTau2017v2p1VSjet_pt-dm
corrections.description: DeepTau2017v2p1VSjet SFs: By default, use the pT-dependent SFs with the 'pt' flag. For analyses with the ditau triggers with offline pT > 40 GeV, use the DM-dependent SFs with flag 'dm'.

inputs.name: genmatch
inputs.description: genmatch: 0 or 6 = unmatched or jet, 1 or 3 = electron, 2 or 4 = muon, 5 = real tau

inputs.name: flag
inputs.description: Flag: 'pt' = pT-dependent SFs, 'dm' = DM-dependent SFs (pT > 40 GeV)
